name: Curried Rice
keywords: curry powder, raisins, rice, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 sprigs fresh thyme or 1/2 teaspoon dried
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the onions and garlic. Cook and stir until wilted. Add the remaining ingredients and bring to a boil, stirring. Cover tightly and simmer for 17 minutes.
Remove the bay leaf and thyme sprigs. Mix well and serve hot.
